topic.title: Introduction: Configuration, Customization, Coordination
topic.shortdesc: "Leiningen is for automating Clojure projects without setting your hair on fire."

dlentry.dd: Use it to "configure" tools, i.e. set options, for various tasks.
Groups and individuals can inherit general configurations and then customize them on a per-task and/or per-project basis.

Use it to integrate and coordinate related activities. For example, quality assurance, code check-in, and issue tracking are related activities. Leiningen can help you automate standard procedures such as: first QA check code, then check it in with a reference to the bug it fixes, and then close the bug in the Issues Tracker, annotating it with the commit ID.
